maqras.text: 15|50|Va in ki azoʙi man azoʙe dardnok ast
15|51|Va az mehmononi Iʙrohim [niz] ʙa onon xaʙar ʙideh
15|52|Hangome ki ʙar u vorid sudand, salom guftand, [ammo cun dast ʙa ƣizo naʙurdand, Iʙrohim] guft: «Mo az sumo harosonem»
15|53|Onon guftand: «Natars, mo turo ʙa pisare dono muƶda medihem»
15|54|[Iʙrohim] Guft: «Ojo ʙo in ki solxurda sudaam, muƶda [-i tavalludi farzand] ʙa man medihed? Ba ci [dalel incunin] ʙasorat medihed»
15|55|Onon guftand: «Mo turo ʙa durusti ʙasorat dodem, pas, noumed naʙos»
15|56|[Iʙrohim] Guft: «Va cuz gumrohon ci kase az rahmati Parvardigoras noumed megardad»
15|57|[On goh ʙa faristagon] guft: «Ej firistodagon, kor [-u ma'murijat]-i sumo cist»
15|58|Onon guftand: «Dar haqiqat, mo ʙa suji qavmi gunahgor [-i Lut] firistoda sudaem [to halokason kunem]
15|59|Ba cuz xonavodai Lut, ki mo jaqinan, hamai ononro nacot xohem dod
15|60|Magar hamsaras, ki muqaddar kardaem, ki az ʙozmondagon [dar azoʙ] ʙosad»
15|61|Pas, hangome ki faristagon [-i Alloh taolo ʙa sakli inson] nazdi xonadoni Lut omadand
15|62|[U] Guft: «Sumo guruhe nosinos hasted»
15|63|[Faristagon] Guftand: «Balki mo hamon cizero ʙarojat ovardaem, ki [in mardumi gunahgor] dar ʙoraas tardid mekardand [nuzuli azoʙ]
15|64|Va mo ʙarojat [xaʙari haqiqi va] rost ovardaem va hatman, mo rostguem
15|65|Pas, pose az saʙ [ki guzast] xonavodaatro ʙo xud [az in co] ʙiʙar va [xudat] ʙa dunʙolason ʙirav va hec jak az sumo pusti sarasro nigoh nakunad va ʙa coje, ki ʙa sumo farmon medihand, ʙiraved»
15|66|Va Mo u [Lut]-ro az in amr ogoh kardem, ki suʙhgohon resai onon kanda xohad sud
15|67|Va ahli sahr, dar hole ki [dar ʙorai omadani afrodi cadid] ʙo sodi [ʙa jakdigar] xaʙar medodand, [ʙa suji xonai Lut] omadand
15|68|[Lut] Guft: «Inho mehmononi man hastand, pas, maro rasvo [va sarmandai mehmononam] nakuned
15|69|Va az Alloh taolo ʙitarsed va sarsikastaam nasozed»
15|70|[Onon] Guftand: «Magar mo turo az [mizʙonii] afrodi [ƣariʙ] nahj nakardem»
15|71|[Lut] Guft: «Agar mexohed, [kore halol] ancom dihed, inho duxtaroni [ummati] man hastand [ʙo eson izdivoc kuned]»
15|72|Savgand ʙa coni tu [ej pajomʙar], ki onon dar mastii xes sargasta ʙudand
15|73|Pas, hangomi ʙaromadani oftoʙ ʙongi [margʙor] ononro faro girift
15|74|On goh on [sarzamin]-ro zeruru kardem va ʙar onon sanggilhoe pajopaj ʙoridem
15|75|Ba jaqin, dar in [kajfar] ʙaroi husjoron iʙrathost
15|76|Va on [sahrhoi vajrona hanuz] ʙar sari rohi [musofiron] poʙarcost
15|77|Jaqinan, dar in [azoʙ] nisonahoe ʙaroi [iʙrat giriftani] mu'minon ast
15|78|Va ashoʙi Ajka [qavmi Suajʙ], hatman, sitamgor ʙudand
15|79|Pas, [Mo] az onon intiqom giriftem va [sahrhoi vajronsudai] in du [qavm] ʙar sari roh oskor ast
15|80|Va ʙe tardid, ahli Hicr [qavmi Samud] pajomʙaronro duruƣgu angostand
15|81|Va [Mo mu'cizot va] nisonahoi xudro ʙa onon dodem, va [-le] az onho rujgardon sudand
15|82|Va az kuhho xonahoe [ʙaroi xud] metarosidand, ki dar amon ʙimonand
15|83|Pas, suʙhgohon ʙong [-i margʙor] ononro faro girift
15|84|Va on ci [az amvolu xonahoi mahkam] ʙa dast ovarda ʙudand, sude ʙa holason nadost [va azoʙi ilohiro daf' nakard]
15|85|Va Mo osmonho va zamin va on ciro, ki mijoni onhost, cuz ʙa haq naofaridaem va qijomat hatman, omadani ast, pas, [ej pajomʙar az kofiron] ʙa nakui guzast kun
15|86|Be tardid, Parvardigorat hamon ofarinisgari donost
15|87|Va ʙa rosti, Mo ʙa tu [saʙ'u-l-masoni» [surai Fotiha] va Qur'oni ʙuzurgro dodem

15|88|[Binoʙar in] Hargiz ʙa on ci [az ne'mathoi dunjavie], ki guruhhoe az onon [kofiron]-ro ʙahramand kardaem, casm naduz va ʙa xotiri [nosiposi va sirki] onon anduhgin maʙos va ʙo mu'minon furutani kun
15|89|Va ʙigu: «Ba rosti, ki man hamon ʙimdihandai oskoram»
15|90|[Va ononro az azoʙ ʙitarson] Hamon guna ki [onro] ʙar taqsimkunandagon [-i ojoti ilohi] firistodem
15|91|Hamon kasone, ki Qur'onro [ʙa] ʙaxsho [-e hamcun se'ru pesgui va codu taqsim] kardand
15|92|Pas, savgand ʙa Parvardigorat, hatman, [dar qijomat] az hamai onon suol xohem kard
15|93|Az on ci mekardand
15|94|Pas, [ej pajomʙar] on ci [-ro, ki az suji Alloh taolo] dastur joftai, oskor kun va az musrikon ru ʙigardon
15|95|Be tardid, Mo [sarri] masxarakunandagonro az tu dur mekunem
15|96|Onon, ki [ʙaroi xud] ʙo Alloh taolo ma'ʙudi digare qaror medihand, pas, ʙa zudi [naticai sirki xesro] xohand donist
15|97|Va [ej pajomʙar] jaqinan, Mo medonem, ki tu az on ci onon [kofiron] megujand, ozurdaxotir megardi
15|98|Pas, ʙa sitoisi Parvardigorat tasʙeh ʙigu va az sacdakunandagon ʙos
15|99|Va to hangome ki margat faro merasad, Parvardigoratro parastis kun
